response.overview: Aziz is a young man with epilepsy. Aziz, who was exposed to his father's violence as a child, has turned his life into a nightmare because of this reason. Aziz, who crashes into a pregnant woman with his car one day, sees the death of the woman and her child, flees from the scene and loses track of him. The husband of the deceased woman casts a death spell on those who cause this pain. Therefore, the beings in the service of the sorcerer are included in Aziz's life. Meanwhile, Aziz's friends Can and İrem try to help Aziz, but they suddenly find themselves in paranormal events.
response.title: İfrit-i Cin
